      static void drawSplotch​(Media.Picture target, java.awt.Color color, int x, int y)
      Draw a splotch on target with color at x,y Note: the splotch is not drawn starting from any corner but instead it is drawn such that x and y are inside the splotch and all of the splotch is visible

      Make a new image thats a splotchy version of pic

      • splotcherize

        public static Media.Picture splotcherize​(Media.Picture pic,
                                         int splotches)
        Make a new image thats a splotchy version of pic
        Parameters:
        pic - the picture to base the new picture off
        splotches - the number of splotches to make
        Returns:
        the new splotchy picture

      • drawSplotch

        public static void drawSplotch​(Media.Picture target,
                               java.awt.Color color,
                               int x,
                               int y)
        Draw a splotch on target with color at x,y Note: the splotch is not drawn starting from any corner but instead it is drawn such that x and y are inside the splotch and all of the splotch is visible
        Parameters:
        target - the target image to draw the splotch in
        color - the color to make the splotch
        x - the x coord where the splotch should -kinda- be
        y - the y coord where the splotch should -kinda- be

      • blending

        public static Media.Picture blending​(Media.Picture pic,
                                     int radius)
        Preform a blur effect on pic bluring with radius
        Parameters:
        pic - the picture to preform blending on
        radius - the radius of the blending
        Returns:
        a new picture made from blurring pic

      • calculateColorAverageWithinRadius

        public static java.awt.Color calculateColorAverageWithinRadius​(Media.Picture pic,
                                                               int x,
                                                               int y,
                                                               int radius)
        This method will calculate the average color at x and y within a given radius in the picture
        Parameters:
        pic - the picture
        x - the x coord of the center average point
        y - the y coord of the center average point
        radius - the radius around the center point to calculate the average color
        Returns:
        the average color calculated
